content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-6.5, 3.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position (-9.5, -0.5)), boiler(position (-6.5, 0.0)) and steam engine(position (-6.5, 3.5))
    - The boiler is now fueled and the steam engine is working

### Crude oil mine at position(17.5, 40.5)
Consists of pumpjack(position (17.5, 40.5))

### Oil refinery at position(17.5, 45.5)
Consists of pumpjack(position (17.5, 40.5)), oil refinery(position (17.5, 45.5)) and storage tank(position (16.5, 50.5))

### Chemical plant at position(22.5, 54.5)
Consists of chemical plant(position (22.5, 54.5)), oil refinery(position (17.5, 45.5)), storage tank(position (16.5, 50.5)) and pumpjack(position (17.5, 40.5))
    - The chemical plant is now connected to the steam engine at position(-6.5, 3.5) via an electricity network
    - An output inserter has been placed at position (20.5, 54.5) to collect sulfur from the chemical plant

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Ensure that the target position is within the maximum placement distance before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when placing entities at occupied positions
- Ensure the target location is clear of other entities before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when accessing non-existent attributes of entities
- Verify that the attribute you are trying to access exists for the entity before attempting to access it.

### Errors when inspecting inventory of entities
- Be aware that some entities may not have inspectable inventories or may return errors when attempting to inspect their inventory.
- Ensure that the entity's inventory is not empty and is accessible.

### Errors when setting invalid recipes for entities
- Verify that the recipe name is valid and applicable to the entity before setting it.

### Errors when entities are not receiving power
- Ensure that the entity is properly connected to a power source and that the power source is functioning.

### Errors when connecting entities with pipes
- Ensure that the source and target connection points are not blocked and that the target is able to receive the fluid from the source.

### Errors when accessing non-existent entities
- Verify that the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to access it.

## NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
